document_data.name: Khorasan
document_data.mainbody:
'''Siri al-Klemin''' was a [[dao]] inhabitant of [[Huzuz]], the City of Delights, in [[1367 DR]].{{AQ-time}}

Siri's real name was '''Khorasan''', though he would never share that information with mortals.
document_data.Personality: Compared to his vocal companion, Siri was quiet and sullen, usually only speaking when addressed by another.
document_data.Activities:
Siri was one of two dao who operated the ferry that ushered people across the mighty [[Al-Sarif River]] that bisected Huzuz.

Siri often exchanged gossip with ferry travelers. [[Kenai al-Afriz|Kenai]] and Siri were known to make deals with the travelers as well, but evil intentions were usually hidden behind their charismatic smiles.
document_data.History: Siri was forced into penance by the [[Kabril Ali al-Sara al-Zalazil|Great Khan of the Dao]] for committing an unknown crime. He missed his homeland greatly and could be bribed to talk about it if paid enough.
